root.name: MAD: Global Thermonuclear Warfare
root.description: MAD (an acronym for Mutually Assured Destruction, the nuclear weapons policy/ideology shared by Russia and the US during the Cold War) is an arcade strategy game of apocalyptic proportions. Build up your bases, arm your satellites and research more and more powerful nukes as you attempt to outmaneuver a wily opponent. There are no prizes for second place - only total destruction of your enemy will guarantee success. Free to play trial - http://www.brothersoft.com/games/mad-global-thermonuclear-warfare.html
